statements: SELECT * FROM telecom_security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM telecom_security_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, created_by FROM telecom_security_policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM telecom_security_policies WHERE created_by='Admin';
SELECT policy_name, created_date FROM telecom_security_policies WHERE created_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM telecom_security_policies WHERE policy_id = 100;
SELECT policy_name, created_by FROM telecom_security_policies WHERE created_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, created_by FROM telecom_security_policies WHERE policy_description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM telecom_security_policies ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_policies FROM telecom_security_policies;
SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies;
SELECT * FROM security_guidelines;
SELECT guideline_id, guideline_name, policy_id FROM security_guidelines;
SELECT guideline_name, guideline_description FROM security_guidelines;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT guideline_id, guideline_name FROM security_guidelines WHERE policy_id = 2 ORDER BY guideline_name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%access%';
SELECT guideline_id, guideline_name, guideline_description FROM security_guidelines WHERE policy_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY guideline_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_guidelines INNER JOIN security_policies ON security_guidelines.policy_id = security_policies.policy_id WHERE security_guidelines.guideline_id > 10;
SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT id, policy_name FROM security_policies ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT guideline_name, guideline_description FROM security_guidelines WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM security_best_practices WHERE practice_name LIKE '%best%';
SELECT id, policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE id <= 3;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE id = 1
SELECT guideline_name, guideline_description FROM security_guidelines ORDER BY guideline_name ASC
SELECT practice_name, practice_description FROM security_best_practices WHERE id > 5
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE id IN (3, 6, 9)
SELECT * FROM security_policies INNER JOIN security_guidelines ON security_policies.id = security_guidelines.id
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM Users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE id > 10;
SELECT Users.username, Users.email, Guidelines.guideline_text FROM Users JOIN Guidelines ON Users.id = Guidelines.policy_id;
SELECT Users.username, BestPractices.practice_description FROM Users JOIN Guidelines ON Users.id = Guidelines.policy_id JOIN BestPractices ON Guidelines.id = BestPractices.guideline_id;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT name, description FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT Users.username, Guidelines.guideline_text FROM Users JOIN Guidelines ON Users.id = Guidelines.policy_id;

SELECT Users.username, BestPractices.practice_description FROM Users JOIN Guidelines ON Users.id = Guidelines.policy_id JOIN BestPractices ON Guidelines.id = BestPractices.guideline_id WHERE Users.id = 1;

SELECT Users.username, SecurityPolicies.name, BestPractices.practice_description FROM Users JOIN Guidelines ON Users.id = Guidelines.policy_id JOIN BestPractices ON Guidelines.id = BestPractices.guideline_id JOIN SecurityPolicies ON Guidelines.policy_id = SecurityPolicies.id WHERE Users.id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT practice_name, practice_desc FROM best_practices WHERE guideline_id = 2;
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_desc FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM guidelines ORDER BY guideline_name DESC;
SELECT teams.team_name, users.user_name FROM teams JOIN users ON teams.team_id = users.team_id WHERE teams.team_id = 2;
SELECT users.user_name, best_practices.practice_name FROM users LEFT JOIN best_practices ON users.team_id = best_practices.practice_id ORDER BY users.user_name ASC
